name: Liquidator
description:
The liquidator is the story of a dynamic new generation of shooters.
In the game you have to play the role of a former soldier of special purpose, which was injured, and now he was sent to work in one of the buildings of the CIA. On the first day, something went wrong...
**********
Our team spent a lot of time the artificial intelligence in the game. Opponents in the game are able to hide, to sneak, to act tactfully. If you think you can just sit in cover and shoot everyone, you are mistaken.
**********
Special attention is paid to the music game. More than 10 atmospheric tracks that will immerse you in the game and force you to care,to empathize with the main character
**********
After the release of our games we've supported them. The first update to fix bugs/errors, optimization. After that we begin to add new features,items,levels, etc.
All our updates are completely free

Features:
- No extra charge!
- Many well-designed levels
- Simple controls
- Modern graphics
- Excellent optimization
- Atmospheric music
- Intriguing plot
